original_title: WWE Paul Bearer's Hits from the Crypt
overview: Join the ghastly Paul Bearer for a chilling journey through some Hits from the Crypt. From Earthquake going one-on-one with Adam Bomb, to The Undertaker facing off against Crush, this Coliseum Home Video Classic features some of the best action from WWE's New Generation!
tagline: Unbelievably Grueling Matches Matches Hand-Picked by the Manager of The Undertaker!
title: WWE Paul Bearer's Hits from the Crypt
